Buy runes and apply them to your rune page (if you haven't done that already)

Rune page for Tanks and AD Assassins, such as Garen and Fiora

9 Seals of Armor
9 Glyphs of Magic Resist
9 Marks of Attack Damage
3 Quintessences of Attack Damage

Rune page for Attack Damage and Attack Speed fighters, such as Irelia and Xin Zhao

9 Seals of Armor
9 Glyphs of Magic Resist
9 Marks of Attack Damage
3 Quintessences of Attack Speed

Rune page for mages such as Kennen, Lux, etc

9 Seals of Armor
9 Glyphs of Magic Resist
9 Marks of Magic Penetration
3 Quintessences of Ability Power

Remember to buy Tier 3 Runes

Go to champion.gg to look up on each champions, and their runes, as well as their Masteries.

In order to beat Riven, you need to deny her as much cs (creeps slain, or minions slain) as possible, be tanky, do not give her kills, and wait for Riven to engage on you before you go into trade with her.

I recommend you to search up on how to beat riven in any matchup by a diamond riven main, on reddit, google search it, and read it through, it gives you detailed information on a lot of top lane champions vs riven, also, it is best for you to use riven (when she's free) in Co-op vs AI or custom game, to have a basic knowledge of her abilities.

You may also want to look at amsatelite's Garen vs Riven video on youtube, to see how he beats Riven.

I have been using Garen to beat Riven multiple times as of now, by taking his advice. Riven is a very easy kill for me.

Chat with your League of Legends friends, and if any of them have Riven, ask them how to counter Riven, and perhaps get into a custom match of fighting Riven with them (your friend use Riven against whatever champion you pick), this should help you to fight against Riven as well.
